name: test_CMS_214_Delete_From_Comment_Thread
description:
Test Case 214: Verify ability to delete comment from comment/question thread.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Check for unread notifications
5. If no unread notifications, switch to Read tab
6. Open the first comment thread
7. Delete comment in thread
8. Verify comment is deleted successfully
descriptionHtml:
Test Case 214: Verify ability to delete comment from comment/question thread.

Test Steps:

  1. Launch the browser
  2. Login as admin user
  3. Navigate to Notifications page
  4. Check for unread notifications
  5. If no unread notifications, switch to Read tab
  6. Open the first comment thread
  7. Delete comment in thread
  8. Verify comment is deleted successfully
statusMessage:
playwright._impl._errors.TimeoutError: Locator.click: Timeout 30000ms exceeded.
Call log:
  - waiting for locator(".chakra-table__container tbody tr").filter(has_text="Step Comment").first
statusTrace:
@allure.feature("11.0.0 CMS Notifications")
    @allure.epic("Web CMS Testing")
    @allure.story("11.14.0 Delete From Comment Thread")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.NORMAL)
    @allure.description("""
    Test Case 214: Verify ability to delete comment from comment/question thread.
    
    Test Steps:
    1. Launch the browser
    2. Login as admin user
    3. Navigate to Notifications page
    4. Check for unread notifications
    5. If no unread notifications, switch to Read tab
    6. Open the first comment thread
    7. Delete comment in thread
    8. Verify comment is deleted successfully
    """)
    def test_CMS_214_Delete_From_Comment_Thread():
        with sync_playwright() as p:
            browser = p.chromium.launch(headless=False, slow_mo=200)
            page = browser.new_page()
    
            # Login using the existing login class
            login_page = LoginPage(page)
            login_page.loginDev(admin_user, admin_pw)
    
            # Navigate to Notifications page
            notifications_page = NotificationsPage(page)
            notifications_page.go_to_notifications()
    
            # Check if there are unread notifications
            if notifications_page.has_notifications():
                print("Unread notifications found. Opening the first notification.")
                notifications_page.open_first_comment_thread()
                notifications_page.delete_comment_in_thread()
            else:
                print("No unread notifications found, switching to Read tab.")
                notifications_page.switch_to_read_tab()
    
>               notifications_page.open_first_comment_thread()
